Title: Restless
Plot: Buffy, Xander, Giles and Willow sit down to watch videos after defeating Adam. They enter a bizarre dream world where they are pursued by a primitive force that they released via their enjoining spell.
GuestStars: Phina Oruche, Rob Boltin, Sharon Ferguson, David Wells, Michael Harney, Emma Caulfield, Kristine Sutherland, Amber Benson, Mercedes McNab, George Hertzberg, Seth Green, Armin Shimerman
